attributes.action: Take action against Russia’s nuclear missile threats.
attributes.additional_details: If the missile is launched the consequences are immense.
attributes.background: More sanctions and threats against those threats.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 
	
We're not exactly sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. In particular, we're not sure what threats or sanctions you'd like to see. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
